meanings.definition: A condition or circumstance that puts one in a favorable or superior position.
meanings.sent1: Having many advantages in life can lead to success.
meanings.sent2: One of the advantages of living in a big city is easy access to various amenities.
meanings.sent3: The cat found an old box and used it to its advantage as a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was her greatest advantage in overcoming challenges.
meanings.sent5: The advantages of regular exercise include improved health and mood.

meanings.definition: A benefit gained from a situation.
meanings.sent1: The student realized the advantages of studying early for exams.
meanings.sent2: One of the advantages of working from home is the flexibility it offers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found an advantage in storing nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness proved to be an advantage in making new friends.
meanings.sent5: The advantages of teamwork include increased productivity and shared ideas.

meanings.sent1: Helping others can advantages both the giver and the receiver.
meanings.sent2: It advantages us to plan ahead for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The clever strategy advantages the team in winning the game.
meanings.sent4: Eating a balanced diet advantages our overall health.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise advantages our physical and mental well-being.
